## Pages

### Home
https://calsite.zappy5.app
Jump into hundreds of free browser based games to play with friends instantly. No downloads, no blocks, just pure gaming fun. Start playing now at Calsite!

### Games
https://calsite.zappy5.app/games
Discover the best free proxy server for gaming and access unlimited browser games. Play instantly without downloads or restrictions. Your ultimate game collection awaits!

### Proxy Portal
https://calsite.zappy5.app/proxy
Browse anything freely with our secure proxy portal. Bypass blocks, access any content, and enjoy the best free proxy server for gaming without limitations or tracking.

### Contact
https://calsite.zappy5.app/contact
Need help or have game suggestions? Contact Calsite&#39;s team for quick support, feature requests, or partnership inquiries. We&#39;re here to enhance your gaming experience!

# Business Context (for LLM understanding)

## About Calsite
Create a website that has a bunch of free games that open in the website and add a proxy so the person can search anything in the website and nothing will be blocked

## Target Audience
- Teen Gamers with Proxy Needs
- College Students Seeking Free Games

## Industry
entertainment/gaming
